content: sugar sugar yayalovestoknit november 22 2018 i had a good time with sweet roll this year knitting for our local hats for kids project the long color changes make each hat unique this hat is another quick and easy knit the stitch pattern is only 2 rounds and easy to memorize knock out a hat while the game is on the look is appropriate for either gender just knit additional repeats if you want a slouchier hat song of the day sugar sugar the archies https //www youtube com/watch v=paajkezbdvc this song always makes me smile hope you ll get the happy vibe too size child small to medium the sample hat measures 8 to 8⅟2 from top to bottom and 17 to 18 around the bottom band unstretched yarn aran weight 1 | pa ge the sample hats were knit using 61 grams/107 yards of premier yarns sweet roll 100% acrylic 140 grams/245 yards the one on the left in bubble pop and the one on the right in rocket pop needles us 06 and 08 circular needles plus us 08 double pointed needles other tools stitch marker tapestry/darning needle gauge 17 sts x 23 rnds = 4 square using us 08 abbreviations used k= knit k2tog = knit two stitches together p = purl psso = pass slip_stitch over pw = purlwise sl slip a stitch purlwise st s = stitch es yo = yarn over begin pattern using the 06 circular needle cast on 80 sts taking care to not twist the stitches place the stitch marker to indicate the beginning of round and join to begin knitting in the round knit 3 rounds of stockinette to form the rolled edge if you don t care for the look of a rolled edge please feel free to skip this step bottom band 1 k1 p1 x3 k4 around 2 knit around repeat until band measures 2 to 2⅟2 from the bottom edge body of hat change to us 08 continue knitting the 2-round stitch pattern until the hat measures 7 to 7⅟2 from the bottom edge for a slouchier fit knit additional rnds ending with the 2nd round crown of hat decreases you will be reducing the number of stitches on the needles as you knit this section begin decreases to form crown of hat change to double pointed needles when there aren t enough stitches to knit comfortably with the circular needle 2 | pa ge 1 k1 p1 x3 k4 around 2 k7 k2tog k1 around 8 sts decreased 72 sts remain 3 k1 p1 x3 k3 around 4 k2tog x3 k3 around 48 sts 5 k1 p1 k4 around 6 knit around 7 k1 p1 k1 k2tog k1 around 40 sts 8 knit around 9 sl1 pw k2tog psso k2 around 20 sts 10 k2tog around 10 sts finishing cut the yarn leaving at least a 12 yarn end using the darning needle thread the yarn through the remaining 10 stitches at least twice
